properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 8:22PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Sucarnoochee River At
Livingston...

...Rises continue along most of the Tombigbee and Sucarnoochee Rivers
following the recent heavy rainfall...and a Flood Warning remains in
effect.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  7:15 PM Friday the stage was 70.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 68.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 75.8 feet by
Monday evening then begin falling.
* Impact...At 77.0 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
